about_the_game:
With the new and complimentary DLC „VanHool Generationen Reihe“ we get the forgotten coach series of VanHool on your harddrive. Twelve different busses are in the pack included. These include the Belgium-busses A120, A320, A360, AG280 and AG300.

The manufacturer „VanHool“ supports the project of the „VanHool Generations Series“. Therefore there are original sounds and qualitative textures included. These make the add-on even more realistic. The whole interior is fully operative and was built with numerous animations and with a lot of passion for detail. Moreover you can create with the aid of the repaint-submittals your own repaints – allow your ideas full bent. For a impeccable start, we have provide a range of HOF-files, which can be choose at the vehicle selection. Start now behind the driver‘s seat and hear the sounds of the old and throbbing engines.


  • 12 different busses of the French speaking area of Belgium
  • True to original sounds and recordings of the VanHool busses
  • Provided and approved of VanHool, TEC and De Lijn
  • Fully operative interior with numerous animations and functions
  • Different repaints towards Flemish art incl. BVG repaints
  • Optimized HOF-files for a simple start
  • Repaint-submittals are included
  • Exclusive version on Steam; Installer and files to extract are also available
  • Supplies options for your OMSI 2 settings
  • Manuals and video tutorials for a simple start
detailed_description:
With the new and complimentary DLC „VanHool Generationen Reihe“ we get the forgotten coach series of VanHool on your harddrive. Twelve different busses are in the pack included. These include the Belgium-busses A120, A320, A360, AG280 and AG300.

The manufacturer „VanHool“ supports the project of the „VanHool Generations Series“. Therefore there are original sounds and qualitative textures included. These make the add-on even more realistic. The whole interior is fully operative and was built with numerous animations and with a lot of passion for detail. Moreover you can create with the aid of the repaint-submittals your own repaints – allow your ideas full bent. For a impeccable start, we have provide a range of HOF-files, which can be choose at the vehicle selection. Start now behind the driver‘s seat and hear the sounds of the old and throbbing engines.


  • 12 different busses of the French speaking area of Belgium
  • True to original sounds and recordings of the VanHool busses
  • Provided and approved of VanHool, TEC and De Lijn
  • Fully operative interior with numerous animations and functions
  • Different repaints towards Flemish art incl. BVG repaints

name: OMSI 2 Add-on VanHool Generationen Reihe

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2,8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: at least 1024 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: OMSI 2 – The Omnibussimulator at least 2.3

short_description: With the new and complimentary DLC „VanHool Generationen Reihe“ we get the forgotten coach series of VanHool on your harddrive. Twelve different busses are in the pack included.
